name: The Frostrune
description: Unravel a mystery inspired by Viking myth and legend in The Frostrune, a classic point-and-click adventure based on historically accurate Norse culture and environments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: From 2007 or newer Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: From 2007 or newer DirectX: Version 7.1 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: From 2007 or newer Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: From 2011 or newer DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
